comments.text: This DEEP habitat concept is intriguing, aligning perfectly with my interest in undersea habitats and the broader goal of building an underwater city.  The modular design and public access aspects are particularly noteworthy, suggesting a potential pathway towards making such environments more accessible and less resource-intensive than previously imagined.
